ij.gui

Class ImageRoi

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.gui.Roi
      • ij.gui.ImageRoi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ImageRoi
extends Roi
    An ImageRoi is an Roi that displays an image as an overlay.
    See Also:
    ImagePlus.setOverlay(ij.gui.Overlay), Serialized Form
